import React from 'react' import './contact.css' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; function Contact() { function sendEmail() { event.preventDefault(); // منع إعادة تحميل الصفحة بعد الضغط على زر الإرسال emailjs.sendForm( 'YOUR_SERVICE_ID', 'YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID', event.target, 'YOUR_USER_ID' ) .then((response) => { console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text); document.getElementById('contact_message').innerHTML = '✔ Message sent successfully'; document.getElementById('contact__form').reset(); }) .catch((error) => { console.log('FAILED...', error); document.getElementById('contact_message').innerHTML = 'Failed to send message. Please try again.'; }); } return (

Get in Touch

Contact Me

Message

) } export default Contact
